description: Details required for Conditions 4 (Refuse and Recycling Facilities), 5 (Cycle Parking), 6 (Construction Management Plan) and 7 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission 23/01002/FUL (Subdivision of existing ground floor unit into 2nos retail units/shopfront and signage replacement above shopfront entrances)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: DISIA Surbiton District Centre Inset Area
ART4 Surbiton District Centre Inset Area

decision_conditions: The provision of foldable bicycle lockers is not considered an adequate level of cycle parking provision and would not adequately promote sustainable forms of transport, contrary to policy T5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS6 and DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 6 (Construction Management Plan). Therefore, the proposal would fail to demonstrate that the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers, highway safety and the free flow of traffic would be safeguarded in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
